alert.note: Alert for Chambers; Tallapoosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 26 at 5:00AM CDT until March 26 at 5:45AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Tallapoosa County in east central Alabama... Northern Chambers County in east central Alabama... * Until 545 AM CDT. * At 500 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near New Site, or 13 miles north of Dadeville, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Stroud, New Site, Five Points, Goldville, Fredonia, Post Oak Forks, Veasey Creek Park, Denson, Amity Park, Abanda, Standing Rock, Welch, Penton, Trammel Crossroads, Buffalo, Sparkling Springs, Daviston, Southern Harbor, White Plains and Horseshoe Bend National Military Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
